sig_info: Bishop prepares a unique bonus based on how many bars of Power are full at the start of the fight.
With 0 Bars: Special Attacks become Unblockable with a stack of 29.92 to 10.01 or more Prowess.
With 1 Bar: While Blocking, gain Stun Immunity and enemies lose 10.28 to 80% ability accuracy.
With 2 Bars: Special Attacks leave the target Incinerated for 10.13 to 70% of the Special Damage dealt over 10 seconds.
With 3 Bars: Start the fight with Steady Release active for 3.05 to 15 seconds.

PERSISTENT POWER METER: Bishop’s mastery over energy and time enables him to enter a fight with 100% of the Power he finished his previous fight in the same Quest with.
Bishop’s Special 1 and 2 Attacks cost no Power when activated. Instead, after these Specials end, Bishop immediately loses however many Bars of Power that special would have cost.
ALWAYS ACTIVE - PERSONAL PROWESS: All of Bishop’s Personal Passive Prowess effects increase Special Attack Damage by 10%.
ALWAYS ACTIVE - ENERGY TRANSFERENCE: +3105.88 Energy Resistance.
Every 1 second(s), on receiving any Energy Damage gain 3 Passive Prowess.
Absorbing the kinetic energy of Blocking or being Struck generates 1 stack of Prowess, Well Time Blocks gain an additional +6 Prowess.
All these abilities grant +1 Prowess vs Skill Opponents, and -1 vs Tech.
BLOCKING: Holding Block for 0.5 seconds, Bishop converts 1 Personal Prowess into a Regeneration Buff every 0.33 seconds, granting 6.66 Health over 5 seconds. Max Stacks: 5.
Each Prowess converted also has an 100% chance to Purify a Bleed Debuff.
ALWAYS ACTIVE - DEBUFF FEEDBACK: Each time the Opponent Purifies a Debuff they instantly receive 67.95 Energy Damage.
Skill Champions also receive a Passive Stun lasting 1.50 second(s) if the Debuff Purified was a Stun.
WARNING: POWER OVERLOAD!: While Bishop has more than 30 Prowess, or if he’s Bleeding, Shocked, or Incinerated he Overloads and begins consuming his personal Prowess effects 1 at a time, getting faster the longer he’s been Overloading.
If Bishop is suffering from a Bleed, Shock, or Incinerate, Debuff or Passive, each time he consumes a Prowess this way he also deals 17 Energy Damage to his Opponent, scaling with Base Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: After each Special Attack Bishop consumes all his Personal Prowess Passives.
If Bishop is Overloading go Unblockable for the Duration of the Special Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: After this Special Attack finishes, gain a Steady Release Passive for 10 seconds.
While active every 0.75 second(s) while near the opponent, inflict an Incinerate Debuff on them, dealing 27.63 Energy Damage over 3 seconds.
Each Prowess consumed by this attack increases the Duration of Steady Release by 2.5%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The last hit has a 100% chance to inflict an Incinerate Debuff lasting 10 seconds, and dealing 70% of the total damage dealt by this Special.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to inflict a non-stacking Energy Vulnerability reducing Energy Resistance by 970.69 for 20 seconds.
Against enemies at full Health, this Energy Vulnerability becomes indefinite.

SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to inflict a non-stacking Energy Vulnerability reducing Energy Resistance by 1152.7 for 20 seconds.
Against enemies at full Health, this Energy Vulnerability becomes indefinite.

sig_info: Bishop prepares a unique bonus based on how many bars of Power are full at the start of the fight.
With 0 Bars: Special Attacks become Unblockable with a stack of 29.92 to 10.01 or more Prowess.
With 1 Bar: While Blocking, gain Stun Immunity and enemies lose 10.28 to 80% ability accuracy.
With 2 Bars: Special Attacks leave the target Incinerated for 10.13 to 70% of the Special Damage dealt over 10 seconds.
With 3 Bars: Start the fight with Steady Release active for 3.05 to 15 seconds.

PERSISTENT POWER METER: Bishop’s mastery over energy and time enables him to enter a fight with 100% of the Power he finished his previous fight in the same Quest with.
Bishop’s Special 1 and 2 Attacks cost no Power when activated. Instead, after these Specials end, Bishop immediately loses however many Bars of Power that special would have cost.
ALWAYS ACTIVE - PERSONAL PROWESS: All of Bishop’s Personal Passive Prowess effects increase Special Attack Damage by 10%.
ALWAYS ACTIVE - ENERGY TRANSFERENCE: +3785.29 Energy Resistance.
Every 1 second(s), on receiving any Energy Damage gain 3 Passive Prowess.
Absorbing the kinetic energy of Blocking or being Struck generates 1 stack of Prowess, Well Time Blocks gain an additional +6 Prowess.
All these abilities grant +1 Prowess vs Skill Opponents, and -1 vs Tech.
BLOCKING: Holding Block for 0.5 seconds, Bishop converts 1 Personal Prowess into a Regeneration Buff every 0.33 seconds, granting 69.78 Health over 5 seconds. Max Stacks: 5.
Each Prowess converted also has an 100% chance to Purify a Bleed Debuff.
ALWAYS ACTIVE - DEBUFF FEEDBACK: Each time the Opponent Purifies a Debuff they instantly receive 711.47 Energy Damage.
Skill Champions also receive a Passive Stun lasting 1.50 second(s) if the Debuff Purified was a Stun.
WARNING: POWER OVERLOAD!: While Bishop has more than 30 Prowess, or if he’s Bleeding, Shocked, or Incinerated he Overloads and begins consuming his personal Prowess effects 1 at a time, getting faster the longer he’s been Overloading.
If Bishop is suffering from a Bleed, Shock, or Incinerate, Debuff or Passive, each time he consumes a Prowess this way he also deals 178 Energy Damage to his Opponent, scaling with Base Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: After each Special Attack Bishop consumes all his Personal Prowess Passives.
If Bishop is Overloading go Unblockable for the Duration of the Special Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: After this Special Attack finishes, gain a Steady Release Passive for 10 seconds.
While active every 0.75 second(s) while near the opponent, inflict an Incinerate Debuff on them, dealing 289.25 Energy Damage over 3 seconds.
Each Prowess consumed by this attack increases the Duration of Steady Release by 2.5%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The last hit has a 100% chance to inflict an Incinerate Debuff lasting 10 seconds, and dealing 70% of the total damage dealt by this Special.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to inflict a non-stacking Energy Vulnerability reducing Energy Resistance by 1183.03 for 20 seconds.
Against enemies at full Health, this Energy Vulnerability becomes indefinite.

While active every 0.75 second(s) while near the opponent, inflict an Incinerate Debuff on them, dealing 996.78 Energy Damage over 3 seconds.
Each Prowess consumed by this attack increases the Duration of Steady Release by 2.5%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The last hit has a 100% chance to inflict an Incinerate Debuff lasting 10 seconds, and dealing 70% of the total damage dealt by this Special.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to inflict a non-stacking Energy Vulnerability reducing Energy Resistance by 1304.37 for 20 seconds.
Against enemies at full Health, this Energy Vulnerability becomes indefinite.

sig_info: Bishop prepares a unique bonus based on how many bars of Power are full at the start of the fight.
With 0 Bars: Special Attacks become Unblockable with a stack of 29.97 to 10 or more Prowess.
With 1 Bar: While Blocking, gain Stun Immunity and enemies lose 10.12 to 80% ability accuracy.
With 2 Bars: Special Attacks leave the target Incinerated for 9.99 to 70% of the Special Damage dealt over 10 seconds.
With 3 Bars: Start the fight with Steady Release active for 3.02 to 15 seconds.

PERSISTENT POWER METER: Bishop’s mastery over energy and time enables him to enter a fight with 100% of the Power he finished his previous fight in the same Quest with.
Bishop’s Special 1 and 2 Attacks cost no Power when activated. Instead, after these Specials end, Bishop immediately loses however many Bars of Power that special would have cost.
ALWAYS ACTIVE - PERSONAL PROWESS: All of Bishop’s Personal Passive Prowess effects increase Special Attack Damage by 10%.
ALWAYS ACTIVE - ENERGY TRANSFERENCE: +4270.59 Energy Resistance.
Every 1 second(s), on receiving any Energy Damage gain 3 Passive Prowess.
Absorbing the kinetic energy of Blocking or being Struck generates 1 stack of Prowess, Well Time Blocks gain an additional +6 Prowess.
All these abilities grant +1 Prowess vs Skill Opponents, and -1 vs Tech.
BLOCKING: Holding Block for 0.5 seconds, Bishop converts 1 Personal Prowess into a Regeneration Buff every 0.33 seconds, granting 275.26 Health over 5 seconds. Max Stacks: 5.
Each Prowess converted also has an 100% chance to Purify a Bleed Debuff.
ALWAYS ACTIVE - DEBUFF FEEDBACK: Each time the Opponent Purifies a Debuff they instantly receive 2805.89 Energy Damage.
Skill Champions also receive a Passive Stun lasting 1.50 second(s) if the Debuff Purified was a Stun.
WARNING: POWER OVERLOAD!: While Bishop has more than 30 Prowess, or if he’s Bleeding, Shocked, or Incinerated he Overloads and begins consuming his personal Prowess effects 1 at a time, getting faster the longer he’s been Overloading.
If Bishop is suffering from a Bleed, Shock, or Incinerate, Debuff or Passive, each time he consumes a Prowess this way he also deals 702 Energy Damage to his Opponent, scaling with Base Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: After each Special Attack Bishop consumes all his Personal Prowess Passives.
If Bishop is Overloading go Unblockable for the Duration of the Special Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: After this Special Attack finishes, gain a Steady Release Passive for 10 seconds.
While active every 0.75 second(s) while near the opponent, inflict an Incinerate Debuff on them, dealing 1140.75 Energy Damage over 3 seconds.
Each Prowess consumed by this attack increases the Duration of Steady Release by 2.5%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The last hit has a 100% chance to inflict an Incinerate Debuff lasting 10 seconds, and dealing 70% of the total damage dealt by this Special.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to inflict a non-stacking Energy Vulnerability reducing Energy Resistance by 1334.7 for 20 seconds.
Against enemies at full Health, this Energy Vulnerability becomes indefinite.
